frontmatter.title: AWS Route 53 Resolver
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for AWS Route 53 Resolver
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Local VPC domain names for EC2 instances (for example, ec2-192-0-2-44.compute-1.amazonaws.com).
Records in private hosted zones (for example, acme.example.com).
For public domain names, Route 53 Resolver performs recursive lookups against public name servers on the internet.
